classitems.description:
wrench.copyDirSyncRecursive("directory_to_copy", "new_directory_location", opts);

Recursively dives through a directory and moves all its files to a new location. This is a
Synchronous function, which blocks things until it's done. If you need/want to do this in
an Asynchronous manner, look at wrench.copyDirRecursively() below.
Note: Directories should be passed to this function without a trailing slash.

classitems.description: Various data format functions to format the data send via http request
classitems.name: dataformat_

classitems.description: Various data format functions to format the data send via http request
classitems.name: validation_

classitems.description:
To validate whether the value is in a standard time format or not

Regular expression used is - /^(\d{1,2}(\.\d{2})?)([ap]m)?$/
classitems.name: validation_.time

return.description: true if valid time else false

classitems.description: To validate whether the value is a number
classitems.name: validation_.number

return.description: true if valid number else false

classitems.description:
To validate whether the value is a url
Regular expression used is - /(http|https):\/\/(\w+:{0,1}\w*@)?(\S+)(:[0-9]+)?(\/|\/([\w#!:.?+=&%@!\-\/]))?/
classitems.name: validation_.url

return.description: true if valid url else false
